snippet: The owner of the steamship United States, which carried many notable passengers in its heyday, is seeking to have the vessel converted into business space.
abstract: SS United States Conservancy, struggling owner of steamship United States, is in talks with three developers about ship's potential to be converted into a business space like hotel, museum, mall or conference center facility; ship has been tied to Delaware River pier in Philadelphia since 1996.
lead_paragraph: The owner of the steamship United States, which carried many notable passengers in its heyday, is seeking to have the vessel converted into business space.
